query:
SELECT
    ml.name AS movement_log,
    ml.vehicle,
    ml.driver,
    ml.status,
    ml.route_id,
    ml.from_timestamp,
    ml.to_timestamp,
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, ml.expected_arrival_ts, ml.actual_delivery_ts) AS delay_minutes,
    op.control_room_contact
FROM `tabMovement Log` ml
LEFT JOIN `tabOperation Plan` op ON op.name = ml.operation_plan
WHERE ml.from_timestamp BETWEEN %(from_time)s AND %(to_time)s
ORDER BY ml.from_timestamp DESC
LIMIT 500
